div.p: I used to watch a lot of films, I used to watch Backdraft and as a fire fighter, like a fire marshal, I wouldn’t mind, I did want to be
a fire fighter when I was younger I thought that would have been pretty cool. Yeah, yeah I’d say that; we all like to have ambitions
of being a football player I guess and being a role model, an actor, whatever but a fire fighter was probably the thing.
